com.aventstack.extentreports

Interface ExtentReporter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAnalysisStrategy, ReportAggregatesListener, TestListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractReporter, BasicFileReporter, ExtentHtmlReporter, ExtentXReporter

    public interface ExtentReporter
extends TestListener, ReportAggregatesListener, IAnalysisStrategy
    Primary interface implemented by each reporter. This interface implements TestListener and ReportAggregatesListener interface to provide additional functionality to each reporter.
